title: Himi 55
lyrics:
7s 6s
1.
Ko e mo’oni, ‘e ha’u
‘I he teunga lahi,
‘A e ‘Eiki fakamaau
‘I he mā’oni’oni.
‘A e kakai fulipē
Na’a ne huhu’i.
2.
’E toki ‘alu atu
‘A e kakai tui
‘O fakafetaulaki
Ki honau kāinga,
‘Ofa ke tau ongo’i
‘Oku ‘i hotau loto
‘A hono Laumālie
Ke tau mo’ui ai.
3.
’E kāinga mamahi
Pea manavasi’i
Ke mou tui mālohi
Ta’e ngaueue’i
He kuo tei hoko mai
Homou Fakamo’ui,
‘A e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū
Ko hotau Huhu’i.
4.
Ke tau teu pea tali
Ki he hā’ele mai,
‘A e ‘Eiki fakamaau
‘I he nāunāu lahi,
He ko e kau tali teu
‘I he mā’oni’ioni,
Te nau hoko pea ma’u
‘A ‘ene ‘Afio.  *
